CloudStoragePath: Google Cloud Storage path to file.
DataCenterName: Short name of the contributing data center, e.g. bcgsc.ca.
DataCenterType: Abbreviation of the type of contributing data center, e.g. cgcc.
DataFileName: Name of the datafile stored on the DCC file system.
DataFileNameKey: Key into the ISB-CGC GCS bucket for this file.
DataLevel: Level of the type of data, depending on where it is stored in the DCC directory structure. Data levels are defined by TCGA DCC.
DatafileUploaded: Whether the file fit requirements to be uploaded into the project.
Datatype: Data type, e.g. Complete Clinical Set, CNV (SNP Array), DNA Methylation, Expression-Protein, Fragment Analysis Results, miRNASeq, Protected Mutations, RNASeq, RNASeqV2, Somatic Mutations, TotalRNASeqV.
GenomeReference: Allows a center to associate results with a specific genome build that was used as the basis for analysis, e.g. hg19 (GRCh37)
Pipeline: A combination of the center and the platform that can distinguish between two ways of performing the sequencing or assay for the same platform, e.g. bcgsc.ca__miRNASeq.
Platform: A platform (within the scope of TCGA) is a vendor-specific technology for assaying or sequencing that could possibly be customized by a GSC or CGCC, e.g. IlluminaHiSeq_miRNASeq.
Project: The study for which the data was generated, e.g. TCGA.
Repository: A storage location where files are deposited and made available, e.g. DCC, CGHub.
SDRFFileName: Name of SDRF file stored on the DCC file system, e.g. bcgsc.ca_KIRC.IlluminaHiSeq_miRNASeq.sdrf.txt
SecurityProtocol: An indication of the security protocol necessary to fulfill in order to access the data from the file, e.g. DBGap Protected Access, DBGap Open Access
platform_full_name: The full name of the sequencing platform used, e.g. Illumina HiSeq 2000, Ion Torrent PGM, AB SOLiD System 2.0.
